definitions: a person who relies on their own resources to solve a problem or pursue an undertaking

examples.text: there are the blue bloods, and there are the bootstrappers, who've pulled themselves up from the lower classes

shortDefinitions: person who relies on their own resources

definitions: an entrepreneur who starts a business with minimal resources or capital

examples.text: to get employees as a bootstrapper, you're going to have to lean on your friends, family, and colleagues

crossReferenceMarkers: another term for bootstrap (sense 2 of the noun)

examples.text: the bootstrapper provides several overridable methods to configure and extend the start-up routine
